programs.description: Welfare program for mutual aid and protection.
Transformation of business by way of business incubation and serves as center for entrepreneurial development.
Harnessing organizational capacity and promote issues through advocacy.

mission.description: To help one another in promoting business opportunities among Micro, Small, Medium Entrepreneurs (MSMEs).
To encourage new breed of entrepreneurs who understand that the sole purpose of wealth is not only for wealth's sake but to help other people.
To provide every Cebuano entrepreneur a venue to develop, enhance and strengthen its potential and capabilities in helping the Philippine economy.
To provide appropriate assistance to Filceb members with reliable support and make exposure to local and international market.
To foster strategic alliances with national and local government units/agencies to advance the cause of the MSMEs.
